A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: They should have listened to Hamill when they finished the film. When a hardcore fan has mixed feelings leaving the theater\, then there is a problem. That is exactly what happened. Plot holes\, subplots dropped from previous film\, and parts of the movie displayed the fundamental lack of understanding by the director and writers\, plus the bad timing of jokes and forced political do-good that had zero plotlines. This hot mess gets a 4/10.?
